channel.title: Cellan-Jones, Rory on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cellan-Jones, Rory on Chege's Blog

item.title: COVID-19
item.description: Contact Tracing “Apps” in this context means contact tracing apps released by public health authorities to do contact tracing. The APIs are limited to them. Big Picture Release APIs to enable apps to interoperate between Android and iOS devices. Bluetooth-based contact tracing baked into Android and iOS, such that no app is needed for broadcasting/listening. This ensures broad adoption, but will be on an opt-in basis.
